Text: @Nepotu, Just wanted to thank you for all the hard work you put into this. It's great to be able to rewatch these games and relive the joy. THANK YOU AGAIN!!!
You're welcome, my dear friend! I'm happy to make you happy.
Does anyone know if the World Series can be found here ? The cable network in our country is nothing short of banditry.
check it out! It's already up.
